definition[0]: to become or make something become smaller or less
example[0]: The party’s share of the electorate has diminished steadily.
example[1]: These drugs diminish blood flow to the brain.
definition[1]: to deliberately make someone or something appear less important or valuable than they really are
example[2]: Don’t let him diminish your achievements.
example[3]: But that’s not to diminish the importance of his discoveries.
